Yang Hyong Sop Meets New Iranian Ambassador to DPRK 
   Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Morteza Moradian, new Iranian ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.

Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Family 
   Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by the family of Zhang Weihua, anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, on February 6 on the occasion of the lunar New Year's Day, Juche 97 (2008).
